resources.string:
You are done here.

The Pro features in the free version that you have installed already are now unlocked.

You keep using the launcher icon and shortcuts from before. Your data etc. from before are also waiting for you.

Have fun with NewsRob!

Just one more step!

The Pro version unlocks the Pro features in the free version.

It seems that you have not installed the free version yet.

Please do that and then you're done.


Have fun with NewsRob!
